proposal: Navigating cross-chain waters can be as tricky as finding a needle in a haystack, but it looks like PIPE Platform has the magnet. With your seamless lending and borrowing across chains, powered by top-notch protocols, you're setting a new standard in DeFi. Congrats on gathering 119 holders in the ETH network! If you're looking to further empower your community, our suite of B2B tools, including a DEX and Lottery, could align perfectly with your vision of maximizing yields and enhancing user experience. Let's bridge our solutions for a stronger ecosystem.
